Title: Authorizes an additional report and recommendations from the stretch limousine passenger safety task force and extends provisions of law relating thereto
Summary: Authorizes an additional report and recommendations from the stretch limousine passenger safety task force; extends provisions of law relating thereto; requires such additional report be issued on or before December 1, 2024; extends such provisions of law until December 31, 2024.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 3 of the laws of 2020 relating to establishing the stretch limousine passenger safety task force, in relation to authorizing an additional report and recommendations and in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
